appCatchphrase.noStyle: Trusted short links from public officers

appDescription.subtitle: $t(general.appTitle) short links can only be created by public officers, so you can be sure it’s from a trustworthy source.

antiPhishing.description: Shorten your links with a trustworthy $t(general.emailDomain) domain, so your users know they are from a public officer.

customised.description: Long URLs are hard to remember and take up space. Create and share short links instead.

analytics.description: Want to know how popular your links are? Track each link's click rate through our web interface.

fileSharing.description: Upload your file to share it with anyone, using a customised and trustworthy go.gov.sg short link.
